text: 24.46: Sng 22; Ais 50.6; 52.14–53.12; Hos 6.2; Ru 24.26; FG 17.3Ana nen mbe nzua vov, khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ ki gavar ki buneŋ khaŋ nzuai, Fhe Bakɨme taagip kha gumgi gu mbigi ndir zav farasarigi guma, ana fharav zaa ndiv rimgirga, raa phuni vhɨzgirim, khegenen, ana taagip khavgirga.
